content: in socks wyib with yarn in back https //youtu be/us8xrmvlzfg grafting toe with kitchener stitches wyif with yarn in front https //youtu be/efhxnvfmobe crate socks pattern version 1 0 | copyright © knitsbylois 2025 this pattern is for personal and non-commercial use only do not sell reproduce distribute or use for ai training page 2 instructions leg co 54 62 70 78 sts using german twisted co split sts evenly between 2 needles there are 27 31 35 39 sts on each needle first half of the sts are on n1 and the last half are on n2 note if you are using short circular needles or double-pointed needles place a marker at the beginning of the round and another marker at the halfway point the first half of the stitches can follow the instructions for n1 and the last half can follow the instructions for n2 join to knit in the round being careful not to twist sts crate socks pattern version 1 0 | copyright © knitsbylois 2025 this pattern is for personal and non-commercial use only do not sell reproduce distribute or use for ai training page 3 for size s for size m round 1 p1 k1 *p2 sl1p wyif k1 sl1p wyif p2 k3 repeat from * 2 more times to 2 sts before end ending with k1 instead of k3 p1 repeat for n2 round 2 p1 k1 *p2 k3 repeat from * 5 more times to 2 sts before end ending with k1 instead of k3 p1 repeat for n2 round 3 p1 k1 *p2 k1 sl1p wyif k1 p2 k3 repeat from * 2 more times to 2 sts before end ending with k1 instead of k3 p1 repeat for n2 round 4 reprnd 2 legend knit purl sl1p wyif crate socks pattern version 1 0 | copyright © knitsbylois 2025 this pattern is for personal and non-commercial use only do not sell reproduce distribute or use for ai training page 4 for size l round 1 p1 k3 *p2 sl1p wyif k1 sl1p wyif p2 k3 repeat from * 2 more times p1 repeat for n2 round 2 p1 k3 *p2 k3 repeat from * 5 more times p1 repeat for n2 round 3 p1 k3 *p2 k1 sl1p wyif k1 p2 k3 repeat from * 2 more times p1 repeat for n2 round 4 reprnd 2 for size xl round 1 p1 k2 *p3 sl1p wyif k1 sl1p wyif p3 k3 repeat from * 2 more times to 3 sts before end ending with k2 instead of k3 p1 repeat for n2 round 2 p1 k2 *p3 k3 repeat from * 5 more times to 3 sts before end ending with k2 instead of k3 p1 repeat for n2 round 3 p1 k2 *p3 k1 sl1p wyif k1 p3 k3 repeat from * 2 more times to 3 sts before end ending with k2 instead of k3 p1 repeat for n2 round 4 reprnd 2 legend knit purl sl1p wyif
